name: The End (Ascreb_CreaJeu)
description:
The End

A short minimalist more-than-post-apo point-and-click.

A ghost awakens to witness the future.

How to play :

  • click : move, interact
  • escape : quit

The End is open source :

  • mini point & click engine : https://github.com/CreaJeu/LightPointNClick
  • game specific : https://github.com/CreaJeu/DemoLightPointNClick

Made in Créajeu-Ascreb club by two members with Unity (code, music and almost all models). www.ascreb.org
